pkgmetadata.longdescription: #######################################################################Released: 05-20-2023neurodeploy, the next version of neurodeploy, is now stable and recommended for general use.it is easy to start using neuro deploy in your existing projects as well as new projects. Going forward, API updates and all new feature work.Introductionneurodeploy is a Python package that provides interfaces to deply ML models. Currently, all features work with Python 3.ServicesAt the moment, neurodeploy supports:User managementTokens managementApi-keys managementModelsInstallationInstall via pip:$ pip install neurodeployInstall from source:
